roles.package_details: Total package offered: INR 16.74 Lacs, which includes INR 5 Lacs as Long Term Bonus that will be strategically disbursed over the coming years to ensure long-term value for the candidate. Package for 1st year: INR 11,74,166 LPA. First year package also includes joining bonus of INR 1,00,000 which will be a straight-up amount given to the candidates in two different installments. They will receive the first installment of INR 50,000 with their first salary as a full-time employee and the remaining INR 50,000 after they complete 3 months as a full-time employee. Students are also entitled to a hotel accommodation (one-time benefit) of INR 20,000 (non-cash benefits) if they are an out-stationed employee.
